channel.title: Colossus! Looking for beta players! Join today!
channel.description:
Hello and welcome fellow MoparScapians! My name is Alex, and today I'm revealing a project I've put quiet some time into. It's called Colossus!
Self-Bio: I nearly grew up going in between normal RS and 317 all around servers, The feel for a server is so much better than RuneScape, seeing the tighter community, and just watching a project grow. I love skilling as well as combat, but taking the time to achieve all this; just not at the rate of a year or even a decade playing RuneScape. I decided I am capable of coding one, editing one, owning one, moderating one, being the artist, the liberator, the law and the say of a server of my own. So I welcome Colossus to a closed beta set of MoparScapians!
What I'm asking for! I would like some players to come and just try out the game, see if they like it, find bugs, boss, try drop rates, training methods, have fun. c: I have several IRL friends trying out the server as we speak, but i would like help from the outside world! I plan on going public, with a VPS within a month, so now we're just polishing up. Im running off a hamachi server sadly, but this way i can promise it'll stay up 24/7. Thinking why should I help you? Well! Beta players will be treated to PERMANENT donator rank for lifezzz. c: As well as a possible Mod/admin spot depending on dedication, attitude ext. c: Much, much more!
READY TO PLAY? :D Scroll to the bottom? NOT CONVINCED? KEEP READING!
The server its self! Green = Currently working and active. Yellow = Working on or 1/2 way done. Red = Still in the works of adding to the game.
Good combat! A full PvP system! PvP rewards Dozens of bosses! A fresh new original home! Individual server rewards system! Kickin' ass donator options and zone. Curses Lunar's Ancients Fully working spells. Staff of light Torva Chaotics: Rapier, Maul, Staff, Arcane necklace, Longsword ext. (CrossBow)
[color=]Gravite(For lower levels! ) Rapier, 2h, staff ext.. Fully working GodWars! (NEX) Corporeal Beast! King Black Dragon FULL Dagganoth Kings Tormented Demons "Icy Bones" Balance Elemental Sea Troll Queen NOMAD! "bal'lak the pummeller" Giant Mole Kalphite Queen Phoenix Rammernauts Arizian Avatars Revenants! AND MANY MORE! Vesta Longsword, Spear, Statius hammer, Morg Jav's throwing axe's, zuriels staff aswell as there pvp armor counter parts! Woodcutting Fire making! Bond fires! Agility Thieving Crafting Fletching Cooking Fishing Mining Smiting[/color] Farming SUMMONING! Full pouches 1-99. 138 Combat!! Dungeenering - Started with snippets, in the process in adding my own original dungeenering experience. Stay tuned :) Hand Cannon, Saradomin Bow, working D claw spec, Korasi. PRIMAL ARMORS AND WEAPONS (Unable to obtain as of now, maybe add a way to achieve at some point with some feed back.) Teletabs Skilling area Pking areas FULLY WORKING SLAYER - With bad ass slayer shop. w/points. c: Working money pouch Herblore RuneCrafting AND SO MUCH MORE!
I have been keep some patch notes and updates within the website I'm starting to run. http://colossus-server.yolasite.com/
Download Client:[url=http://uppit.com/ty4ls4trjaex/Colossus_Client_v1.5.rar] http://uppit.com/ty4ls4trjaex/Colossus_Client_v1.5.rar[/url] Download cache: [url=http://uppit.com/unaolug7sz5v/ColossusCache.rar]http://uppit.com/unaolug7sz5v/ColossusCache.rar[/url]
HAMACHI INFORMATION (case sensitive) : Colossus-server Colossus-server1 Colossus-server2
pass: 123 (if asks)
Having issues with the cache? See my guide. [url=http://colossus-server.yolasite.com/]http://colossus-server.yolasite.com/[/url]
HERES SOME PICTURES! :D
[img]http://oi47.tinypic.com/34ypeec.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2luosqq.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2l974pi.jpg[/img] Donator KC option c:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1twl82.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2cs7uhz.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/f54oew.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi48.tinypic.com/2nl5stt.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi47.tinypic.com/wtcbic.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi47.tinypic.com/efoxma.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/346mk60.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi49.tinypic.com/nmerzs.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi47.tinypic.com/f0bzt0.jpg[/img]
Lastly, sorry for the previous post made by my friend. I sent him the draft and he thought I wanted him to post it for me, but I'd like to keep things within the server name. Thanks for understaning. <3
-Alex.

item.title: Colossus! Looking for beta players! Join today!
item.dc:creator: @RSPSColossus RSPSColossus
item.description:
@RSPSColossus wrote:

This isn’t exilluim, however I did play exl, and I did use a Similar source, However I’m pulling ideas from some servers, such as exilluim, RuneSky, and many others. But in the end product, I hope I can make this orginal. I just finished 100% summoning, added some dungeenering Items and working on coding in it. I’m planning to continue this server, I won’t let the bad feed back let it down! If you have concerns or need to contact me, leave a comment.

Read full topic
item.source: Colossus! Looking for beta players! Join today!

item.title: Colossus! Looking for beta players! Join today!
item.dc:creator: @RSPSColossus RSPSColossus
item.description:
@RSPSColossus wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

I noticed you have Windows 8. How is that going for you if you’re really a programmer?

It’s really not that bad, you just need to fix the compiler and the run files. But, other that theres no diffrence. I perfer windows 8 now actually, windows 7 was good, i was it from realse to windows 8 beta. However, once you adjust, its fine!

Read full topic
